sentence.text: Should CYP2D6 be genotyped when treating with tamoxifen?
Letter in regards to: Del Re M, Rofi E, Citi V, Fidilio L, Danesi R
Should CYP2D6 be genotyped when treating with tamoxifen? Pharmacogenomics 17(18), 1967-1969 (2016)
Don't think twice it's all right: tamoxifen and CYP2D6 genotyping in the treatment of breast cancer patients
